summary: A thriller that follows two siblings who decide to fend for themselves in the wake of a botched casino heist, and their unlikely reunion during another family's Thanksgiving celebration.
cast: Eric Bana|Olivia Wilde|Charlie Hunnam|Dennis Lafond|Patrick Kerton|Kwasi Songui|Kris Kristofferson|Sissy Spacek|John Robinson|Job Daniel|Kate Mara|Jocelyne Zucco|Treat Williams|Jason Cavalier|Maxime Savaria|Kyle Gatehouse|Allison Graham|Tomomi Morimoto|Nobuya Shimamoto|Cheryl Diabo|André Kasper|Anie Pascale|Andrew Johnston|Sarah Booth|Teale Bishopric|Alain Goulem|Catherine Colvey|Victor Cornfoot|Warona Setshwaelo|Tom Jackson|Kevin Desfosses|David Goff|André Lemire|Benoit Priest
title: La huida (Deadfall)
